## ouroctl apply license

Apply a license to the system

### Synopsis

Applies a license to the system based on the provided input.

```
ouroctl apply license [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Apply a license using a token
  ouroctl apply license --token your_license_token
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for license
  -t, --token string   License token to apply
```

* [ouroctl apply](ouroctl_apply.md)	 - Apply changes to the system
